dao.db

Class CompanyDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDaoDb
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    This layer contains CRUD methods & additional methods for using in the facade layer, according to user needs (no business logic).
